subject: CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
body:
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT
PAYMENT NOTIFICATION CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
OFFICE CODE:(CBN 1960)
IMPORTANT INFORMATION: PART PAYMENT OF ($18.7M)
Attention;
I am Mrs. Mary Ann the confidential Secretary to the past Central
Bank of Nigeria Governor (CBN) Mallam Sanusi Lamido Sanusi. I have an
urgent information that is vital to you, if you promise that you will
not betray me.
The information is about your outstanding payment with the Federal
government of Nigeria which you are supposed to receive through the
apex bank in the 2nd quarter 2014.
My past boss and some of his colleagues in government are involved in
your transaction has conspired to divert your funds to another
account, and the strategy they employed is by demanding several
charges from you, so that you will feel be frustrated and abandon the
fund,thereby it will open an avenue for them to refer your fund as
unclaimed and it will be transferred to their coded account, you can
see all your effort and money you spent to receive this money but all
your effort is in vain.
Our President mandated my retired boss to release your funds to you
which failed before he was suspended and sacked shamefully due to
fraudulent activities and other miscellaneous offense that led to the
appointment of Folashodun Shonubi, New Acting Governor.
Please this information I am giving to you is a great risk on my
side,i know that you will not forget my effort.
Please if you are not going to put me into trouble about this
development, kindly contact me , As I will give you further
details on how to proceed towards the successful remittance of your
funds.
1 YOUR FULL NAMES ---------------
2 YOUR DIRECT TELEPHONE NUMBER -------------------
3 YOUR CONTACT ADDRESS ---------------------------
4 YOUR OCCUPATION/POSITION ---------------------------
S
 A SCAN COPY OF YOUR OFFICIAL ID
 ---------------------
I look forward to hear from you.
Best regards,
Mrs. Mary Ann Madu

subject: Re: CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Ann Madu,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my payment with the Federal Government of Nigeria. I appreciate your concern and willingness to assist me. Can you please provide more information about the specific charges that have been demanded from me? I want to make sure I understand the situation clearly.

Also, could you explain how my funds were diverted to another account? It's important for me to know the details so that I can take appropriate action.

Regarding the risk you mentioned, what kind of trouble could I potentially face if I proceed with this? I want to ensure that everything is legal and safe.

Please let me know the next steps and any additional information you may need from me.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: Fill the below detail so we can proceed.
body:
Hello Mary Ann Madu,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your interest in connecting with me. However, I'm a bit cautious about sharing personal information online. Could you please provide more details about why you need this information? It would help me understand the purpose of our communication better.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: Fill the below detail so we can proceed.
body:
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT
PAYMENT NOTIFICATION CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
OFFICE CODE:(CBN 1960)

IMPORTANT INFORMATION: PART PAYMENT OF ($18.7M)

Attention: ,

Dear Sir,

Thank you very much for your mail received. Hope you will keep to your
promise that you will never put me in trouble, the amount approved for
you is $18.7 Million Only. I also want to let you know that your fund
will be coming to you VIA ATM CARD delivery to your given address by A
PRIVATE COURIER DELIVERY COMPANY, the only fees needed from you is the
courier fees of â‚¬185 PLUS Insurance Coverage Certificate of $250
TOTAL: $435 enable the courier company deliver your ATM CARD at your
given address within 72 hours of receiving their fees.

Your information is well received as requested; I will proceed getting
all the necessary Legal back up documents to your said funds Wednesday this week
before the courier company can leave with your ATM CARD. I
will also send scan copies of those documents to you once I am through
by Wednesday this week for your perusal.

Thank you very much for your understanding, I will get back to you
once I am through with those documents by Wednesday this week.

I look forward to hear from you.

Best regards,Mrs. Mary Ann Madu

Sent with [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/) secure email.

subject: Re: Fill the below detail so we can proceed.
body:
Dear Mary Ann Madu,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate the information you have provided. I understand that there is an approved amount of Million Only for me, and it will be delivered to my address via an ATM card by a private courier delivery company.

I would like to know more about the courier fees and insurance coverage you mentioned. Could you please provide me with further details regarding the exact amount required for these fees? Additionally, could you explain how the insurance coverage works?

Once I have all the necessary information, I will be able to proceed accordingly. Thank you again for your assistance, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert

Best wishes,
